body:
Um... as I haven't done any AMA for a long time and as it seems like this week is the AMA's week, I will do one.
Another reason I wanted to do this is because today is 22.10.2015 and the addition of these numbers are equal to three, and three is triangle, and triangle is... well you know what... 
Ask away!

title: An other AMA!!!

replies.body:
How did you find Avicus?
Where do you live?
Favourite Food?
Favourite Drink?
Opinions on Avicus?
replies.body_tagged:
How did you find Avicus?
Where do you live?
Favourite Food?
Favourite Drink?
Opinions on Avicus?

replies.body:
One year ago a guy on another server was spamming me with msgs to join it.
I live in Buenos Aires, Argentina.
My favourite food is... whatever I could find in the fridge.
My favourite drink is for sure pear juice c:
I think Avicus shall not be forgotten, and it's the best server which could have ever existed. Avicus is surely NOT going downhill.
